name: boss-ai-platform
description: Boss AI Platform - Микросервисная платформа для управления бизнесом

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:ozon" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend/main && npm install && cd ../ozon-manager && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend/main && npm run build && cd ../ozon-manager && npm run build && cd ../../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:ozon" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:frontend"

author: Boss AI Team
